text: i’m contemplating bringing my pup bella into the office tomorrow for a trial run. is there anything i should do beforehand? she’s super sweet and well behaved and only barks at the things she should bark at like burglars
not any more. mainly we want civilized behavior out of dogs and accountability for dog behaviors from owners. within the dogs crew, we should help each other out.
if its your first time to dog club, you will wipe up a mess
she is quite civilized, in dog terms anyways
haha ok, as a dog owner i’m well acquainted with cleaning up gross things
what in the heavens IS this thing?!

There is an unspoken rule that you must bring your dog by to either Melissa or I as members of the new dog welcoming posse. Since she is living it up in Peru I will take on the responsibility for her.
i would be more than happy to bring her by. she is usually shy at first, but after a few pets all she wants is belly rubs forever
also she will likely have to sniff every inch of the office
i will break down her barriers in no time at all. they don’t call me the dog whisperer for nothing
